t: Is Amazon Associates the Same as Amazon Storefront
s: Associates don’t need to own or manage products; they earn from affiliate links shared via blogs, YouTube, or social media. Amazon Storefronts are only available to sellers enrolled in Brand Registry and offer a branded space to showcase your product catalog.
